messages.subject: Mississippi
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kendra, I just looked at the map and Gulfport is quite aways from Columbus. However, we will probably go down that direction a couple of times a year at
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kendra,

I just looked at the map and Gulfport is quite aways from Columbus. However,
we will probably go down that direction a couple of times a year at least,
because we love the ocean, and my youngest thinks he might like to be an
oceanographer or marine biologist when he grows up. (not many oportunities
for either one of those where we are right now!) I wish dh was getting
stationed at Keesler AFB instead of Columbus, but at least we will be within
less than a day's driving distance of the ocean after we move. You are
welcome to email me privately any time. Let us know what MS is like, what
things to expect, places to visit (or avoid), etc.

Suzanna

>Date: Fri, 19 Apr 2002 18:22:33 -0500
>From: "Sweets" <sweety9@...>
>Subject: Re: unschooling conferences

>Hi Suzanna

>I'm not sure where in Mississippi Columbus is.. guess i should pull out my
>map! I'm in Gulfport and so far have had NO luck getting anyone together
>down here. I KNOW there are other homeschoolers but they arent very
>sociable. :( I'm in the planning stages of a Gulf Coast area support group
>so we'll have to wait and see if I can pull anyone out of the woods :)

>Kendra
